trans-unit.source: Encapsulates the results of an asynchronous operation on a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Innkapsler resultatet av en asynkron operasjon på en representant.

trans-unit.source: The AsyncResult class is used in conjunction with asynchronous method calls made using delegates.
trans-unit.target: Klassen AsyncResult brukes sammen med asynkrone metodekall opprettet med representanter.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> returned from the delegate's `BeginInvoke` method can be cast to an AsyncResult.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IAsyncResult>returnert fra representanten `BeginInvoke` metoden kan endres til en AsyncResult.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: The AsyncResult has the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.AsyncResult.AsyncDelegate%2A> property that holds the delegate object on which the asynchronous call was invoked.
trans-unit.target: AsyncResult har den <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.AsyncResult.AsyncDelegate%2A>egenskapen som inneholder representanten objekt i asynkron samtalen ble startet.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.AsyncResult.AsyncDelegate%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about `BeginInvoke` and asynchronous calls using delegates, see [Asynchronous Programming Using Delegates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om `BeginInvoke` og asynkrone kall ved hjelp av representant, kan du se [asynkrone Programming ved hjelp av delegater](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets the delegate object on which the asynchronous call was invoked.
trans-unit.target: Henter representanten-objektet som asynkrone samtalen ble startet.

trans-unit.source: The AsyncDelegate property can be cast to the actual class of the user-defined delegate.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen AsyncDelegate kan endres til brukerdefinerte representanten faktiske klasse.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the delegate that was used to make the asynchronous call is of type `MyDelegate`, the delegate that is returned by this property must be cast to `MyDelegate`.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis representanten som ble brukt til å ringe asynkrone er av typen `MyDelegate`, representanten som returneres av denne egenskapen må endres til `MyDelegate`.

trans-unit.source: The callback method can then call the delegate's `EndInvoke` method with the correct signature, in order to obtain the results of the asynchronous method call.
trans-unit.target: Metoden tilbakeringing kan deretter kalle representanten `EndInvoke` metode med riktig signatur for å hente resultater av asynkron metodekallet.

trans-unit.source: The delegate object on which the asynchronous call was invoked.
trans-unit.target: Representanten objektet som asynkrone samtalen ble startet.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: Implementerer den <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink"> </xref> grensesnitt.

trans-unit.source: The AsyncProcessMessage method of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink> interface is not relevant to the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.AsyncResult> class.
trans-unit.target: Metoden AsyncProcessMessage for <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink>grensesnittet gjelder ikke <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.AsyncResult>klasse.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.AsyncResult> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink>

trans-unit.source: Implementation by <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.AsyncResult> throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: Implementering av <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.AsyncResult>oppstår <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.AsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Instead, obtain an <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.AsyncResult> by casting the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> interface returned by an asynchronous call made using a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Hente i stedet en <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.AsyncResult>ved endring av <xref:System.IAsyncResult>grensesnitt som returneres av et asynkront kall opprettet med en representant.</xref:System.IAsyncResult> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.AsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: The request <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: Forespørselen <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage"> </xref> grensesnitt.

trans-unit.source: The response <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: Svaret <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink"> </xref> grensesnitt.

trans-unit.source: No value is returned.
trans-unit.target: Ingen verdi returneres.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object provided as the last parameter of a <xref uid="langword_csharp_BeginInvoke" name="BeginInvoke" href=""></xref> method call.
trans-unit.target: Henter som den siste parameteren i det angitte objektet en <xref uid="langword_csharp_BeginInvoke" name="BeginInvoke" href=""> </xref> metodekallet.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `BeginInvoke` method, see [Asynchronous Programming Using Delegates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om den `BeginInvoke` metoden, kan du se [asynkrone Programming ved hjelp av delegater](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The object provided as the last parameter of a <xref uid="langword_csharp_BeginInvoke" name="BeginInvoke" href=""></xref> method call.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som ble angitt som den siste parameteren en <xref uid="langword_csharp_BeginInvoke" name="BeginInvoke" href=""> </xref> metodekallet.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle> that encapsulates Win32 synchronization handles, and allows the implementation of various synchronization schemes.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>som innkapsler Win32 synkronisering håndtak, og gjør implementeringen av forskjellige synkronisering skjemaene.</xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle> returned by this method is automatically signaled when the asynchronous operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>returneres av denne metoden er signalisert automatisk når den asynkrone operasjonen er fullført.</xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>

trans-unit.source: The wait handle is not closed automatically when you call `EndInvoke` on the delegate that was used to make the asynchronous method call.
trans-unit.target: Vent håndtaket ikke er lukket automatisk når du kaller `EndInvoke` på representanten som ble brukt til å gjøre den asynkrone metodekall.

trans-unit.source: If you release all references to the wait handle, system resources are freed when garbage collection reclaims the wait handle.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du frigi alle referanser til Vent-referanse, frigis systemressurser når datasanering reclaims Vent-referanse.

trans-unit.source: To free the system resources as soon as you are finished using the wait handle, call the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: For å frigjøre systemressurser så snart du er ferdig med håndtaket vent, kan du kalle den <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Garbage collection works more efficiently when disposable objects are explicitly closed or disposed.
trans-unit.target: Datasanering fungerer mer effektivt når disponible objekter er eksplisitt lukket eller fjernet.

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > The <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle> contained in the AsyncWaitHandle property can be used to block the current thread until the asynchronous call is complete.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > I <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>i AsyncWaitHandle kan brukes til å blokkere gjeldende tråd til asynkrone kallet er fullført.</xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>

trans-unit.source: However the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle> will ignore the <xref:System.AsyncCallback>, if one was specified during the `BeginInvoke` call.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid den <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>ignorerer den <xref:System.AsyncCallback>, hvis spesifisert under den `BeginInvoke` kall.</xref:System.AsyncCallback> </xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, a situation can occur where the application shuts down before the <xref:System.AsyncCallback> has finished executing, even if a <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle> is used to block until the asynchronous call completion.
trans-unit.target: Derfor en situasjonen kan oppstå der programmet avsluttes før den <xref:System.AsyncCallback>er fullført, selv om en <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>brukes til å blokkere før asynkront kall er fullført.</xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle> </xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.source: For an example of such a situation, see the example for the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.AsyncResult> class, and remove the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Sleep%2A?displayProperty=fullName> statement.
trans-unit.target: Et eksempel på slike tilfeller kan du se eksempel for den <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.AsyncResult>klasse, og Fjern den <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Sleep%2A?displayProperty=fullName>setningen.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.Sleep%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.AsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle> that encapsulates Win32 synchronization handles, and allows the implementation of various synchronization schemes.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>som innkapsler Win32 synkronisering håndtak, og gjør implementeringen av forskjellige synkronisering skjemaene.</xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref uid="langword_csharp_BeginInvoke" name="BeginInvoke" href=""></xref> call completed synchronously.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref uid="langword_csharp_BeginInvoke" name="BeginInvoke" href=""> </xref> kall synkront er fullført.

trans-unit.source: If it is detected that the `BeginInvoke` call completed synchronously in the <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate, it is probable that the thread that called BeginInvoke is the current thread.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er oppdaget som den `BeginInvoke` kall fullført synkront i den <xref:System.AsyncCallback>representant, er det sannsynlig at tråden som kalles BeginInvoke er gjeldende tråd.</xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.source: Most providers of the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> interface will not use the capability and will return a default `false`.
trans-unit.target: De fleste leverandører av den <xref:System.IAsyncResult>grensesnittet bruker ikke muligheten og returnere en standard `false`.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Current implementation of CompletedSynchronously always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer gjeldende implementeringen av CompletedSynchronously alltid `false`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref uid="langword_csharp_BeginInvoke" name="BeginInvoke" href=""></xref> call completed synchronously; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref uid="langword_csharp_BeginInvoke" name="BeginInvoke" href=""> </xref> kall fullført synkront; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether <xref uid="langword_csharp_EndInvoke" name="EndInvoke" href=""></xref> has been called on the current <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.AsyncResult"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om <xref uid="langword_csharp_EndInvoke" name="EndInvoke" href=""> </xref> er kalt på gjeldende <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.AsyncResult"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref uid="langword_csharp_EndInvoke" name="EndInvoke" href=""></xref> has been called on the current <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.AsyncResult"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis <xref uid="langword_csharp_EndInvoke" name="EndInvoke" href=""> </xref> er kalt på gjeldende <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.AsyncResult"> </xref>; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the response message for the asynchronous call.
trans-unit.target: Henter svarmeldingen for asynkrone kallet.

trans-unit.source: The GetReplyMessage method can return an object after the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.AsyncResult.SyncProcessMessage%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetReplyMessage kan returnere et objekt etter den <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.AsyncResult.SyncProcessMessage%2A>-metoden.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.AsyncResult.SyncProcessMessage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage> return value can be cast to an <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodReturnMessage>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage>Returnerer verdien kan endres til en <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodReturnMessage>.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodReturnMessage> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage>

trans-unit.source: However, you do not need to call either of these methods directly.
trans-unit.target: Du trenger imidlertid ikke å kalle en av disse metodene direkte.

trans-unit.source: They are intended for use by the remoting infrastructure of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: De er ment for bruk av ekstern kommunikasjon infrastruktur av .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: A remoting message that should represent a response to a method call on a remote object.
trans-unit.target: En ekstern kommunikasjon melding som må representere et svar på et metodekall på et eksternt objekt.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the server has completed the call.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om serveren har fullført kallet.

trans-unit.source: The server must not use any client supplied resources outside of the agreed upon sharing semantics after it sets the IsCompleted property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Serveren kan ikke bruke klienten angitt ressurser utenfor den avtalte ved deling semantikk når egenskapen IsCompleted settes til `true`.

trans-unit.source: Thus, it is safe for the client to destroy the resources after the IsCompleted property returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Derfor er det trygt for klienten ikke fjerne ressursene når egenskapen IsCompleted returnerer `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> after the server has completed the call; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Når serveren er fullført kallet; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the next message sink in the sink chain.
trans-unit.target: Henter den neste melding sink i sink-kjede.

trans-unit.source: The current implementation of NextSink returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer den gjeldende implementeringen av NextSink `null`.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink"></xref> interface that represents the next message sink in the sink chain.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink"> </xref> sink grensesnitt som representerer neste melding i sink-kjede.

trans-unit.source: Sets an <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageCtrl"></xref> for the current remote method call, which provides a way to control asynchronous messages after they have been dispatched.
trans-unit.target: Angir en <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageCtrl"> </xref> for gjeldende eksterne metodekallet, som gir en måte å kontrollere asynkrone meldinger når de har blitt fordelt.

trans-unit.source: You do not need to call the SetMessageCtrl method.
trans-unit.target: Du trenger ikke å kalle metoden SetMessageCtrl.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageCtrl"></xref> for the current remote method call.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageCtrl"> </xref> for gjeldende eksterne metodekallet.

trans-unit.source: Synchronously processes a response message returned by a method call on a remote object.
trans-unit.target: Synkron behandler en svarmelding ble returnert av et metodekall på et eksternt objekt.

trans-unit.source: The SyncProcessMessage method implements the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink> interface.
trans-unit.target: Metoden SyncProcessMessage implementerer den <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink>

trans-unit.source: You do not need to call this method directly.
trans-unit.target: Du trenger ikke å kalle denne metoden direkte.

trans-unit.source: It is intended for use by the remoting infrastructure of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: Det er ment for bruk av ekstern kommunikasjon infrastruktur av .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: SyncProcessMessage invokes the consumer code's <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate.
trans-unit.target: SyncProcessMessage aktiverer forbrukeren kodens <xref:System.AsyncCallback>delegere.</xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.source: It also sets the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodReturnMessage> instance returned by the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.AsyncResult.GetReplyMessage%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Det angir også de <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodReturnMessage>forekomsten ble returnert av den <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.AsyncResult.GetReplyMessage%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.AsyncResult.GetReplyMessage%2A> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodReturnMessage>

trans-unit.source: If the `msg` parameter is of type <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodReturnMessage>, the same object is returned by <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.AsyncResult.GetReplyMessage%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den `msg` parameteren er av typen <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodReturnMessage>returneres det samme objektet av <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.AsyncResult.GetReplyMessage%2A>.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.AsyncResult.GetReplyMessage%2A> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodReturnMessage>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, a reply message that contains a remoting exception is returned.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke, returneres en svarmelding som inneholder en ekstern kommunikasjon-unntak.

trans-unit.source: SyncProcessMessage also modifies the value returned by the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.AsyncResult.IsCompleted%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: SyncProcessMessage også endrer verdien som returneres av den <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.AsyncResult.IsCompleted%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.AsyncResult.IsCompleted%2A>

trans-unit.source: A response message to a method call on a remote object.
trans-unit.target: En svarmelding til et metodekall på et eksternt objekt.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
